title: Original Skins (various champs)
body:
Hi I'm Cir and i've been creating some skins just for fun and i wanted to share them with you :)

{{champion:50}} Swain:
http://fav.me/dal6y8r http://fav.me/dakx9rc

{{champion:117}} Lulu:
[Freezing Blizzard Lulu AKA winter wonder ](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3005584&page=1#post33514253)  
 http://fav.me/d6k5gdx http://fav.me/d5qgm06


Little purple witch:
 http://fav.me/d66qkkb

Reaper lulu  (lol): sketch
 http://fav.me/d6vo4ak

{{champion:16}} Soraka:

Banana split: sketch 
http://fav.me/d6m32pd

Hulahula: sketch
http://fav.me/d6m32rh

Dispenser (joke):
 http://fav.me/d6wfs62

{{champion:10}} Kayle:

{{champion:412}} Thresh:

First date (and last)
http://fav.me/d8hrq01

{{champion:31}} Cho'gath

Cho'gy hearteater:

Cir <3

replies.body: that dispenser is really creative.. i kinda laughed for a few mins lol
That one may or may not be hanging up next to a water cooler. >__>
Corporate Mundo {{champion:36}}  Drinks Where He Pleases (that may or may not be at the water cooler).
YES!
{{champion:16}} {{item:3070}}
Tear is fully stacked.

It took me a literal minute to figure out the dispenser was Soraka. When I learned this, I was like. 

http://www.glitters20.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/Funny-Face-17.gif
That Blind Justice Kayle skin is awesome, and I would buy it in a heartbeat.
idk bro I'd have to choose dispenser soraka over that

Cho'Gath is so cuuuuute. :3 

Also, I totally love Lulu's expression in her the purple witch concept!
XD thnx (looks like a cat)
I love cats. :3
me too .3. i have one he is retarded
D'awww. I've got a 14.5 pound kitty named Rengar!
What this kitten named after the champion or vice versa?! Also, KITTENS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

He was named after Rengar! He's just turned 8 yesterday. I adopted him last winter, two days before Christmas. :3

EDIT: Here's a picture: http://imgur.com/wTCKsIm
One of my current foster kittens has one eye with a birthmark that makes it permanently half-closed, so we nicknamed him rengar. He's a sweetie and wouldn't ever bola strike anyone.
Oh my gosh, that's adorable! Do you have a picture?
Here he is!{{champion:107}} Sorry about size, I'm  not super technologically literate.
XD

Man, if I ever get another cat, I'ma have to name it after a League Champ. I hope I get one that eats a lot so I can name him Koggers XD

Also, for anyone interested, please check out my Energy-based ADC/Ranged AD Caster champion concept: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/BxIn84WU-champion-concept-valruk-the-jungles-revenge

THAT WOULD BE SO CUTE. 

I'm restraining myself and not getting another cat, despite the fact that Gnar would be the perfect name. :D
See, I was tempted to go with Gnar, but I've always been a fan of going with under-appreciated names and ideas. Story of my life, if ya dig.
aaaaaaaawwwwwwwwwww <3
Mine sleeps all day and then gets high on catnip.. I WANT HIS LIFE
Mine sleeps all day, end the proceeds to scream when I get home for dinner, then go chill in his cat house. :D
Mine whines for water but when I re-fill his water bowl he just sniffs it and walks away T_T He has a thing for ice cubes doe
That's hilarious. xD My cat likes Oreos. He is also afraid of ice cubes in his bowl. >__>
My cat loves butter, like seriously he loves it
What about Banana Split Soraka? It's awesome. I mean - instabuy. And Blind Justice Kayle, aww. I'm bad at Angel but I would buy it too. {{item:3110}}
dispenser soraka may and will yet be the greatest idea to hit league of legends. {{champion:50}}
rito plz

First Date Thresh gave me an idea, Ultimate skin: Heartseeker Thresh

For his taunts he flirts with **any **enemy support. For Example:

{{champion:37}} "We don't have to talk, I just want to make you scream. <3"
{{champion:63}} "My, My, what are _you_ doing down here?" Or "This is gonna be _hot_."
{{champion:76}}/{{champion:107}} "I don't bite, but i don't mind if you do." Or "Rawrrrr/Purrr..."
{{champion:12}} "I **can** milk those. <3"
{{champion:21}} "My lucky day. ;)"
{{champion:51}} "Shall I bring my fuzzy cuffs too?"
{{champion:25}} Some kinky-cringey joke about her eternal snare.
The list goes on and on.

~~Please don't take the Alistar joke the wrong way.~~
XDDD oh god â™¥

*spit take* Well then.

Awesome taunts x,D for Thresh.
I love those Lulu skins
thnx ^-^
No problem!! Would you happen to be doing Riven at all?
i have a little folder full of ideas XD. when i'm bored i create random things
I can't wait to see more! Keep up the good work!
I really like the ancient warrior Gnar, but i think he would be a better Nighthunter skin. It reminds me of the rengar skin.
aye was the first idea but lol then i added those quetzal's feathers and gold ornaments XD
It still is a good nighthunter. Maybe those are all of his stuff that he got from hunting?

The Lulu drawings are fantastic, imo, but too similar to what already exists for her.  I think the Hula Soraka would be a great addition to the line of Pool Party skins.  And your Kayle, Cho, and Gnar ideas are all fantastic imo!!!
I am legit. still laughing out loud at this dispenser one. Like my stomach hurts while I type this. Bravo, you've made my day.
Just want my snowman urgot this year >-<

I think you guys should do an ultimate xerath skin where he transforms into an futuristic artillery unit while ulting or using different parts of his kit and such. It would compliment the mecha skin line. You could call it Project X            
 X={{champion:101}}

I couldn't even handle the dispenser...my coworkers are looking at me weird.

My god, Rito.  pls.  All of my pls.  My money is here, please take it...
I love heartseeker {{champion:31}}
I love this artwork, you are really talented. Thanks for sharing.
